admin.adblock-div: Add the banner tag where the html code appears
admin.adblock-action-help: Here u can change, default notice 'message, backup'
admin.adblock-supportUsMessage-placeholder: Please support us by disabling AdBlocker on our website.
admin.adblock-supportRedirectUrl-placeholder: Paste a valid URL here or leave it blank
admin.adblock-notice-element: Add Tag where notifications are displayed
admin.adblock-notice-method-help: Here you can change the Notification style
admin.adblock-notice-content-help: Here u can change the content
admin.adblock-notice-content-placeholder: Hi. Can you please help us? I know the ads sometimes are too annoying and you want to use Adblock. But please support us by adding Webiste to the whitelist. It will help us keep Webiste free to use. Thanks for your help!
admin.adblock-notice-content-sup: Supports the above small text message content
admin.adblock-notice-content-sup-placeholder: Press × to turn off notifications and show content.

forum.adblock-notice-content: Hi. Can you please help us? I know the ads sometimes are too annoying and you want to use Adblock. But please support us by adding Webiste to the whitelist. It will help us keep Webiste free to use. Thanks for your help!
forum.adblock-notice-content-sup: Press × to turn off notifications and show content.
